Grouping

Source: R/ssa.fit.R
Group.Rd

Grouping

Usage

Group(y, L, groups)

Arguments

y

A time series or a vector.

L

The window length.

groups

The number of eigentriples for reconstruction.

Value

A matrix with the approximation.

Examples

Group(AirPassengers[1:20], L=10, groups=5)
#>             V1       V2       V3       V4       V5       V6       V7       V8
